context:
DOCUMENT 1:

It was the first world capital to welcome the new millennium. The capital of Iceland, Reykjavik, is the northernmost capital of the world. Here is a link ... Southernmost World Capital - Infoplease Southernmost World Capital
What is the world's southernmost national capital?
The Answer:
That distinction belongs to Wellington, New Zealand .
The cultural capital and geographical center of the country, Wellington is the only world         capital located in the roaring 40s         latitudes . It was the first world capital to welcome the new millennium .
The capital of Iceland ,         Reykjavik, is the northernmost capital of the world.
Here is a link to the Infoplease         Atlas if you want to see for yourself.
â€”The Editors

qa.question: What is the world's most southerly capital?
